required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluation of the Clinical/Biological Characteristics, Efficacy and Safety of Patients With Malignant Pleural Mesothelioma, Treated by Immunotherapy
clinical_study.official_title: Multicentre Observational Study Evaluating the Clinical/Biological Characteristics, Efficacy and Safety of Patients With Malignant Pleural Mesothelioma, Treated by Immunotherapy, in Real Life Setting.

brief_summary.textblock: The objective of this multicentre descriptive analysis is to describe the clinical and biological characteristics of patients who have received Programmed cell death 1 (anti-PD1) / (PDL1) Programmed death-ligand 1 (PDL1) immunotherapy outside of a clinical trial in terms of efficacy and safety.

detailed_description.textblock:
Immunotherapy is now an option in the treatment of malignant pleural mesothelioma. A French study, Mesothelioma Avastin plus Pemetrexed-cisplatin Study 2 (MAPS 2), prospective in 2nd line or more, found 40% and 52% disease control rate with respectively an anti-PD1 antibody or a combo of anti-PD1 and Cytotoxic T-Lymphocyte-Associated protein 4 (anti-CTLA4). Safety was rather good with 14% and 26% grade 3-4 in the Nivolumab and combo group respectively.
Thanks to this trial and data from the literature, Programmed cell death 1 (anti-PD1) / (PDL1) Programmed death-ligand 1 (PDL1) immunotherapy became an option in the treatment of malignant pleural mesothelioma, after validation by a multidisciplinary meeting.
The objective of this multicentre descriptive analysis is to describe the clinical and biological characteristics of patients who have received anti-PD1/PDL1 immunotherapy outside of a clinical trial in terms of efficacy and safety.

secondary_outcome.description: Overall survival from treatment with anti-PD1/PDL1 immunotherapy
Duration of treatment with PD1/PDL1 immunotherapy
Overall survival from the start of the first treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: Tolerance of treatment with PD1/PDL1 immunotherapy evaluated by previous immunotherapy
secondary_outcome.description: Tolerance of treatment with PD1/PDL1 immunotherapy evaluated by following data: which immunotherapy, date of treatment beginning/end

secondary_outcome.measure: Tolerance of treatment with PD1/PDL1 immunotherapy evaluated by adverse event
secondary_outcome.description: Tolerance of treatment with PD1/PDL1 immunotherapy evaluated by following data: numbers of treatment related adverse events from CTCAE v4.0

secondary_outcome.measure: Tolerance of treatment with PD1/PDL1 immunotherapy evaluated by remarkable event
secondary_outcome.description: Tolerance of treatment with PD1/PDL1 immunotherapy evaluated by following data: date of best response, date of progression, date of death)

secondary_outcome.measure: To identify factors predictive of treatment response by immunotherapy in responder patients
secondary_outcome.description: Identify factors predictive of treatment response by immunotherapy in responder patients by collecting following data: Demographics data, treatment data, and blood test results and histological data

secondary_outcome.measure: To identify factors predictive of the response of immunotherapy treatment of progressive patients
secondary_outcome.description: Identify factors predictive of treatment response by immunotherapy of progressive by collecting following data: Demographics data, treatment data, and blood test results and histological data

secondary_outcome.measure: To identify factors predictive of the response of immunotherapy treatment of all patients
secondary_outcome.description: Identify factors predictive of treatment response by immunotherapy of all patients by collecting following data: Demographics data, treatment data, and blood test results and histological data

secondary_outcome.measure: To identify factors predictive of the response of immunotherapy treatment according to follow-up treatment
secondary_outcome.description: Identify factors predictive of treatment response by immunotherapy according to type of treatment after PD1/PDL1 immunotherapy

arm_group.arm_group_label: Patients with malignant pleural mesothelioma treated with Nivolumab.
arm_group.description: Patients with malignant pleural mesothelioma treated with Nivolumab.

intervention.description: Data entered in a secure computer database
intervention.arm_group_label: Patients with malignant pleural mesothelioma treated with Nivolumab.

study_pop.textblock: Patients with malignant pleural mesothelioma treated with Nivolumab.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patient over 18 years of age,
- Diagnosis of malignant pleural mesothelioma affirmed by the anatomo-pathological analysis report of a histological sample of the tumour (re-read by MESOPATH).
- Patient who has received at least one injection of anti-PD1 or anti-PDL1 antibodies
Exclusion Criteria:
- Explicit refusal by the patient to collect data
